body_html: Since I've been muddling through this lately: it might be helpful to explain how you can link the code generated by native_functions.yaml with Python code inside other parts of PyTorch (i.e. via derivatives.yaml, or Declarations.cwrap). I found mostly I had to read through the actual code generators, like gen.py/gen_variable_type.py/function_wrapper.py. I'm not sure this README is the right place to do it, but let me know if you want me to contribute some comments.

body: Since I've been muddling through this lately: it might be helpful to explain how you can link the code generated by `native_functions.yaml` with Python code inside other parts of PyTorch (i.e. via `derivatives.yaml`, or `Declarations.cwrap`). I found mostly I had to read through the actual code generators, like `gen.py/gen_variable_type.py/function_wrapper.py`. I'm not sure this README is the right place to do it, but let me know if you want me to contribute some comments.
